column5: They have more then i'll ever use, and they come with step by step animated instructions!  Here's the link... http://www.animatedknots.com/index.php?Log...imatedknots.com  -R-
I posted that awhile ago..good stuff.
Great site...lots of knots & info !!!!.  ..i had that site years ago,then lost it i couldnt remember the name,thanks very much for finding it for me !!!!....cheers

Must of been before my time Danbo...my bad.  Fishindevil you're welcome...i found it by accident. I'm trying a new line set up on my ice fishing rods. Looks like it might work pretty good. Can't wait for the field testing to begin!  -R-
